comment.author: 48094458@N00
comment._content: Getting an idea of operations before the T-bana opened.

comment.author: 13799327@N06
comment._content: As a Central Line train is shown, this shot is probably taken at White City depot.

comment.author: 36844288@N00
comment._content: It is grand shot of a Standard stock car - these cars formed the Central line stock for many years, many being refurbished after wartime storage for the post-war extensions of the Central line. I wonder if it may not actually be Acton Works? - I can't quite make out the out-shopping date on the cab but it may be 3/48 or 5/48, perhaps the date of the visit - and other pictures in this set such as the seat shop were also at Acton.
